articles.title: The Serie A standings updated after Inter's victory in Reggio Emilia
articles.summary: Inter annihilates Sassuolo by giving them 5 and sending a clear message to the championship, also because on the 24th matchday the distance from second place, obviously awaiting the Milan-Como recovery, becomes important.

articles.title: Lazio, the protest continues: fans invited to leave the Olimpico empty even against Atalanta
articles.summary: This evening Lazio will take the field at the Stadium for the match against Juventus. A very difficult and particular year for Sarri and his team who are currently in eighth place with 32 points, -9 from the Europe zone.

articles.summary: Without any surprise, Bournemouth have bought Alex Jimenez from Milan, with the buyout obligation having been activated as expected. This was reported by Fabrizio Romano, with the journalist also specifying the figures: 19.
